name: pixelfin
description: Pixelfin is a self-hosted pixel art editor with layer support, palette tools, and export features. Designed for pixel artists, it works directly in the browser without external dependencies.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Create pixel art with drawing tools optimized for low-resolution artwork

features.title: Palette Management
features.description: Create and manage color palettes with swatches for consistent artwork

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Save artwork in PNG, GIF, and other formats with configurable scaling

features.title: Undo And Redo
features.description: Navigate edit history with unlimited undo/redo for mistake-free creation
